configurations.name: vsi_producer_topic
configurations.description: Kafka topic for vehicle status and intent messages

configurations.name: mp_consumer_topic
configurations.description: Kafka topic for Mobility Path messages

configurations.name: mo_consumer_topic
configurations.description: Kafka topic for Mobility Operation messages

configurations.name: bsm_group_id
configurations.description: Kafka consumer group for BSM kafka consumer.

configurations.name: mp_group_id
configurations.description: Kafka consumer group for Mobility Path kafka consumer.

configurations.name: mo_group_id
configurations.description: Kafka consumer group for Mobility Operations kafka consumer.

configurations.name: vsi_est_path_count
configurations.description: The number of point (id, ds, ts) in the est_path array. Point: id is the lanelet id. Point: ds is the distance (either distance between two adjacent points or current point to the end of current lanelet. Point: ts is timestamp).

configurations.name: mobility_path_trajectory_offset_duration
configurations.description: Set the time interval between two points in the est_path. The interval is 0.1 second

configurations.name: vsi_th_sleep_milli_sec
configurations.description: Time interval between publishing vehicle status & intent message (value = 1/frequency(in sec)).

configurations.name: bsm_msg_expire_in_sec
configurations.description: Time in seconds after which a bsm is considered expired.

configurations.name: clean_queue_in_secs
configurations.description: Time interval in seconds after which message consumer queues are cleared.

configurations.name: disable_est_path
configurations.description: Bool flag to disable calculation and inclusion of est_path inside vehicle status and intent msg.

configurations.name: is_est_path_p2p_distance_only
configurations.description: If false, distance in the vehicle status and intent est_path is  the distance to the end of the lanelet. If true, distance in the vehicle status and intent est_path is the distance from the previous point
